name: Settings
values: Name of the quiz or campaign name
(Optional) Footer copy right and terms and conditions etc. Support HTML

name: Result 1
values: You manage to get tucked in at a reasonable hour, but your brain struggles to follow suit. Instead, it’s in overdrive calculating the exact amount of sleep you’ll get if you fall asleep this very second. There’s nothing left to do but stare at your phone and incessantly refresh your social feeds. Or stare at cracks in the ceiling. Right? Wrong. Slow your mind down with the soothing pitter patter of Night Rain.

I’m a Ceiling Starer, and as it turns out, my sleep routine could do with a playlist of pouring rain and rolling thunder sounds. https://spoti.fi/NightRain
Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]
*[[WEBSITE-LINK]] will be replaced with the live link by the system automatically. Do not make changes.

name: Result 2
values: The very presence of ~oxygen~ is enough to wake you up in the night. Before you get out of bed and into the pantry, listen to the Deep Sleep playlist – it’ll help you get that extra good REM sleep and ensure you avoid 2am snacker’s guilt.

I’m a Light Sleeper, and as it turns out, my sleep routine could do with a playlist of soothing ambient tracks for deep sleep. https://spoti.fi/DeepSleep 
Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]
*[[WEBSITE-LINK]] will be replaced with the live link by the system automatically. Do not make changes.

name: Result 3
values: You’re a classic night owl. Like all nocturnal creatures, you come alive at night – which means you end up sleeping during the day. The thing is, you’ve got a lot working against you: blinding sunlight, leaf blowers, and the temptation to keep scrolling down your feed. Block it all out with the dreamy ambient sounds of Floating Through Space and enjoy that sweet shut-eye.

I’m a Night Owl, and as it turns out, my sleep routine could do with a playlist of ambient drone sounds to help make me feel weightless. https://spoti.fi/FloatingSpace 
Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]
*[[WEBSITE-LINK]] will be replaced with the live link by the system automatically. Do not make changes.

name: Result 4
values: You’re an absolute bedtime hero. Truly, you are a gold standard sleeper. Your eyes are bag-free and your circadian rhythm is really something. So the question isn’t what’ll put you to sleep, but what will help you wake up in the morning after your marathon sleep? We’ve got just the tonic. It’s time for some extra Morning Motivation.

I’m a Marathon Sleeper, and as it turns out, my sleep needs no improvement – but my mornings are about to get better with this cracking playlist. http://spoti.fi/MorningMotivation 
Take the quiz here: [[WEBSITE-LINK]]
